name: Out of Control (itch) (Varga Jácint)
description:
In the Robot™ Factory the robots have gone rouge, so in order to clean the place up, and to test its abilites, the newest design is sent in to destroy the hostile machines.

Unfortunately our hero's AI has faulted, resulting in things such as moving only in one direction constantly, being unable to properly fly and trying to hit the enemy through walls. Sadly you are too far away to get there physically and help it out.

As a desperate attempt you decide to hack its weaponry, making you capable of deciding when to shoot and of steering its Remote Controlled™ rockets.

Controls:

SPACE for firing rocket

Mouse for aiming

R to restart

Programming, Music and Sound: R.G.O.T.I. https://steamcommunity.com/id/RGOTI/

Art: Mr. First Opinion https://steamcommunity.com/id/Opi01

Level Design: Me
